entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 7:55PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Another Round of Snow Tonight Through Sunday Night... Much of the Eastern Interior will have 2 to 4 inches of snow tonight through Sunday night. Areas along the Alaska Range near Denali Park could have up to 6 inches of snow. Northeast winds gusting to 20 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow in many areas late tonight and Sunday. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Frost Late Tonight And Early Sunday Morning... Patchy frost will develop late tonight, especially in sheltered valleys, as low temperatures drop into the mid and upper 30s. While frost is not expected to be widespread, in areas that see frost, sensitive outdoor plants may be damaged or killed if left unprotected.
